trans:
Price dropped from 14,999 to 9,999 Baht
****Not required to keep track of children care hours****
What AuPair will receive:
1. A1-level language course for test preparation.
2. Course for writing an online application for finding a host family (English).
3. How to apply for a host with an agency in Germany (Teacher Om recommended that Au Pair register through an agency that is certified by the Au Pair Society for her own safety).
4. How to self-schedule requesting a visa, contacting the embassy in this situation will not verify from the confirming queue requesting a visa.
5. Preparing documents for self-requesting a visa.
6. Flight ticket booking service and travel guidance.
7. Individual consultation.
Meet Teacher Om on different matters.
8. Guidance for a rematch case.
üòçSpecialüòç
0.1 Guidance for FSJ/BFD volunteer program.
0.2 Required documents to register and how to write the application.
